required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Immunogenicity of Recombinant Hepatitis B Vaccines in the Neonates
clinical_study.official_title: The Safety and Immunogenicity of 10μg/0.5ml Recombinant Hepatitis B Vaccines(Saccharomyces Cerevisiae) in the Healthy Neonates

lead_sponsor.agency: Shenzhen Kangtai Biological Products Co., LTD

collaborator.agency: Guangdong Provincial Institute of Biological Products And Materia Medica

clinical_study.source: Shenzhen Kangtai Biological Products Co., LTD

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to further evaluate the immunogenicity and safety of 10μg/0.5ml Recombinant Hepatitis B Vaccines(Saccharomyces Cerevisiae) in the Healthy Neonates.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: Within 30 days after hepatitis B vaccination

secondary_outcome.measure: Geometric mean titer of anti-hepatitis B virus surface antigen antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The 30th day after whole course of hepatitis B vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Geometric mean titer of anti-hepatitis B virus surface antigen antibody was measured by chemiluminescence assay and expressed with mIU/mL.

secondary_outcome.measure: Geometric mean titer of anti-hepatitis B virus surface antigen antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The 1th year after whole course of hepatitis B vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Geometric mean titer of anti-hepatitis B virus surface antigen antibody was measured by chemiluminescence assay and expressed with mIU/mL.

secondary_outcome.measure: Geometric mean titer of anti-hepatitis B virus surface antigen antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The 2th year after whole course of hepatitis B vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Geometric mean titer of anti-hepatitis B virus surface antigen antibody was measured by chemiluminescence assay and expressed with mIU/mL.

secondary_outcome.measure: Geometric mean titer of anti-hepatitis B virus surface antigen antibody
secondary_outcome.time_frame: The 3th year after whole course of hepatitis B vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Geometric mean titer of anti-hepatitis B virus surface antigen antibody was measured by chemiluminescence assay and expressed with mIU/mL.

arm_group.description: 5000 participants who are healthy neonates receive 10μg/0.5ml recombinant hepatitis B vaccine on day 0, 30 and 60.

intervention.description: 5000 participants who are healthy neonates receive 10μg/0.5ml recombinant hepatitis B vaccine on day 0, 30 and 60.

overall_official.affiliation: Guangdong Center for Disease Prevention and Control

facility.name: Gaozhou District Center for Disease Control and Prevention
Xinxing District Center for Disease Control and Prevention
